title: ICE: `let_else` ices when placed in a const _: () = { ... }

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Link to [playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=6c28f215e5fa3aa7dfe1adb7e05d23c1) ```Rust #![feature(let_else)] const _: () = { fn foo(x: Option) { let Some(_) = x else { panic!() }; } }; ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (d394408fb 2022-08-07) binary: rustc commit-hash: d394408fb38c4de61f765a3ed5189d2731a1da91 commit-date: 2022-08-07 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_ast_pretty/src/pp.rs:412:52 ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_ast_pretty/src/pp.rs:412:52 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f5b91273c60 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::he9fb4f8b6a719925 at /rustc/34a6cae28e7013ff0e640026a8e46f315426829d/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 1: 0x7f5b91273c60 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h9b7fbe883834f3d3 at /rustc/34a6cae28e7013ff0e640026a8e46f315426829d/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f5b91273c60 -
